ceo.text: As a cornerstone of the UAE 2030 Vision and the National Program to Transform Technology, our core values at Sharjah Asset Management (SAM) emphasize equity and empowerment. Our mission is to create an environment that nurtures young talent, fosters productivity, and promotes a culture of excellence through our unique SAM Internal Excellence Award Program. This approach not only enhances our internal processes and employee satisfaction but also positively impacts our customers and society. Our commitment to these values empowers us to make informed decisions, drive sustainable growth, and lead with impact, embodying our dedication to performance-based results.

dosAndDonts.title: Submission Guidelines
dosAndDonts.do1: Provide specific, measurable evidence for each criterion.
dosAndDonts.do2: Include relevant data, charts, and supporting documents.
dosAndDonts.do3: Ensure all information is accurate and verifiable.
dosAndDonts.dont1: Do not include irrelevant or generic information.
dosAndDonts.dont2: Do not exceed the word limit for any criterion.
dosAndDonts.dont3: Do not submit without reviewing your responses.
dosAndDonts.dont4: Do not upload files exceeding the size limit.
dosAndDonts.technicalReqTitle: Technical Requirements for Nomination and Receipt of Applications
dosAndDonts.reportIntro: All submissions must include a detailed report covering, at a minimum, the following areas:
dosAndDonts.req1: Achievements – Key accomplishments of the organizational unit.
dosAndDonts.req2: "As-Is" Situation and Implemented Changes – Description of the initial state and the changes made that contributed to the achievements.
dosAndDonts.req3: Measurable Results – Quantitative and qualitative evidence supporting the achievements.
dosAndDonts.req4: Economic Value Added – Demonstration of financial or operational value created.
dosAndDonts.req5: Critical Success Factors – Elements that were essential to achieving the results.
dosAndDonts.req6: Relevant Key Performance Indicators and Future Targets – KPIs used to measure success and targets for continuous improvement.
dosAndDonts.req7: Other Key Data and Feedback – Any additional information that supports the report.
dosAndDonts.add1: Applicants shall prepare a comprehensive presentation using standard office tools for the personal interview, covering all required criteria.
dosAndDonts.add2: All relevant evidence should be provided for each criterion. Evidence may include emails, PowerPoint slides, reports, images, or other appropriate formats.
dosAndDonts.add3: It is strongly recommended that all evidence be compiled digitally in a logical, sequential manner.
